TestCaseMetaData.name: Update Deactivate
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Some time after initial Laboratory Test Compendium is delivered electronically from the LIS to the EHR-S, the LIS send up to four eDOS update messages to the EHR-S to deactivate an orderable test. The EHR-S will integrate these updates into its test directory.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Initial load of compendium data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: Data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support deactivating a single record in an existing test compendium.
TestCaseMetaData.Notes: Verification of this test case requires comparison to the data that was available after the intial load.
